definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: plait, turn (Ar. ta0rah;un period, succession (peri/odov));—pl. [[תּוֹרִים]] plaits (of hair ?) Ct So 1:10, cstr. [[תּוֹרֵי זׇהָב]] v:So 1:11 plaits, circlets of gold; sg. turn, opportunity, cstr. [[תּׂר נַעֲרָה]] Es 2:12, cf. v:Es 2:15.—[[תּוֹר אדם]] 1Ch 17:17 is corrupt, ‖ 2Sa 7:19 [[תּוֹרַת הָאָדָם]], also difficult, v. [[תּוֹרָה]]
p. 436; Klo Perles:Anal. 68 [[תּׂאַר]], q. v. p. 1061
